nodes.text: The Ylix militia was the military force which defended Ylix in its war against Goelitz.

Ylix and Goelitz had an ancient rivalry. Terrorists from Goelitz frequently struck against Ylix, forcing the Ylix militia to defend its homeworld. Around the time of the Clone Wars, the militia waged a war against Goelitz which spread across dozens of worlds, subduing Goelitz after a devastating campaign. Gallandro served as a member of the militia, and made a name as one of the force's noted war heroes.
